mission.posting: Seed several servers with backdoors to ease future hacking efforts.

email.subject: /!\Game Broken/!\
email.body:
Hello! If you're reading this message, somehow I haven't programmed something right in Digital Rebels. Please PM me on Discord under CraftmasterMatt #6334.
You WILL break the game if you accept this mission- you can not abandon missions, and this mission is impossible to complete.
Thanks again! -CraftMasterMatt
